title: Scientific Creativity Enhancement Process in Virtual Studio Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific knowledge and proficiency in digital tool usage
context.additional_context: Environment optimized for collaborative problem-solving through social interaction and mobile-based learning activities

learning_goals: Propose three or more creative solutions for scientific problems in VsLEs (Virtual Science Learning Environments)

Learners collect feedback from three or more peers using digital collaboration tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.), incorporate two key suggestions, and submit a final project deliverable (5-page report or 5-minute presentation) within one week.
Improve the ability to express complex scientific concepts through visual storytelling
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
